attributes.action: Demand Headteacher Simon Brennand's Resignation (Montgomery High School - Blackpool Lancashire)
attributes.additional_details:
As a result of the overall deterioration of the standards at Montgomery High School under the 'leadership' of Headteacher Simon Brennand, we are calling for the resignation or termination of Simon Brennand as Headteacher at Montgomery High School.

Once considered one of the "Outstanding Schools" in the country, Montgomery in recent years, as an Academy, has suffered from incompetent management and ineffectual faculty.

Inspection Dates: 7–8 May 2014

Overall Effectiveness
Previous Inspection: Not previously inspected (as an Academy)
This Inspection: Inadequate (4)
Achievement of Pupils: Inadequate (4)
Quality of Teaching: Inadequate (4)
Behaviour and Safety of Pupils: Requires Improvement (3)
Leadership and Management: Inadequate (4)
